posts.post_title: Ungraded T206 Lattimore EX For Sale
posts.post_content:
I have the following card for sale
T206 Sweet Cap 350, Lattimore EX condition, No creases, marks or paper loss. Sorry that the photo is a bit blurry; its the best I can do with the camera that I have. The card is very nice. Centered $30.00 delivered.

First email that says I will take it gets it.

Thanks,

Joe
